divs: sighting detailsthe above grid asked for specific info about "one" event. i'd actually like to discuss two that might be related. i can't say the objects i've seen were "other-worldly" in nature, but they were certainly strange. i've witnessed both flying in the same area from my backyard over the last couple of months. details below... a couple of months back i was sitting in my backyard late at night. something bright and fast (i mean, really fast) moving at a high altitude caught my eye. it was a bright dot that moved across the sky. way too fast for a satellite. could have been a meteor, but i've never seen one last so long, and with no trail whatsoever. plus, i'd swear it's movement was somehow erratic. a perfectly straight line yes, but not one hundred percent smooth in its "motion". i'm not a trained observer, but i've seen my share of meteors. i really don't think this was one of them. it went from one end of the sky all the way to the other before disappearing over the horizon. a very long distance. it accomplished this in about two, maybe two and a half seconds. although i found the sight fascinating, i didn't put too much stock into it. then a week or so ago, again sitting in my backyard late at night, i saw a similar object flying in the same area, and in the same direction. this time, however, it was much lower. it moved about the speed of a plane. in fact, i figured it was just that as we live close to the burbank airport, but it's path did not match what usually flies in\out of the area. too high and going the wrong way. what was most curious about the object was that it had no blinking lights or headlights and it made no sound whatsoever. we've become very familiar with planes in our six months living in this house, and they all have had the usual lights\sounds. we see a lot of helicopters too. definetely wasn't that. i kept an eye on the object for about 30-45 seconds and then, very suddenly, it was gone. just gone. it didn't blink out. it simply stopped "being there". not sure i can completely describe it, but if it were a plane, i've never heard one that silent, or seen one with no federally required hazard lights\headlights, nor have i seen one turn all its lights out in the dark in a heavilly frequented air traffic zone. it was there, and then it wasn't. could be nothing, but i don't often seen strange things in the sky. now, in the span of about a month or two, i've seen two. both in the same spot in the sky (though at different altitudes), and both heading the same way. east, over the mountains above old town burbank. i've never reported anything like this before, and i don't know how credible you might find it, but i figured i would just suggest you guys keep an eye out for other reported sightings in the burbank\san fernando valley area. weird stuff. thank you.
Summary: Object flew at alt. equivalent of plane, but had no signal lights and made no noise. disappeared in front of my eyes. no explanation.
